titocc.compiler.elements

Class CodeElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • titocc.compiler.elements.CodeElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArgumentList, Declaration, Expression, Parameter, ParameterList, Statement, TranslationUnit, Type

    public abstract class CodeElement
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base for all the code elements. Stores the position of the element within the source file so that it can be used by compiler messages. Also provides functions for pushing/popping registers to/from stack (which should probably be refactored somewhere else).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a code element.

      • pushRegister

        protected Register pushRegister(Assembler asm,
                    java.util.Stack<Register> registers)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Allocates an additional register. Assumes that at least one is available. If two or more are available then does nothing. If only one is available, then pushes one of the reserved registers to stack and it will be added to available registers. The new register will be added so that it is used after the original first one, so that the first one can be used for returning the expression's value.
        Parameters:
        asm - assembler used for emitting the push instruction
        registers - available registers; must contain at least one register
        Returns:
        register that was pushed to stack or null if no register was pushed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if assembler throws

      • popRegister

        protected void popRegister(Assembler asm,
               java.util.Stack<Register> registers,
               Register pushedRegister)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Deallocates the register reserved by the call to pushRegister. If pushRegister pushed a register to stack, then popRegister will emit the corresponding pop instruction and remove the register from available registers. Otherwise does nothing.
        Parameters:
        asm - assembler used for emitting the pop instruction
        registers - available registers
        pushedRegister - return value of pushRegister()
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if assembler throws
